languages.text: Мы достигли станции Скит, и лишь милость Императора позволила нам сделать это. Корабль изжеван челюстями голодного Имматериума, безумие поселилось на наших палубах и ходит меж нами, заглядывая в глаза. На орбите судно сопровождают тысячи молчаливых спутников — это тела погибших, выброшенные в шлюзы.

traits.locale_text: Мы достигли планеты Скит, и лишь милость Императора позволил нам сделать это. Корабль изжеван челюстями голодного Имматериума, безумие поселилось на наших палубах и ходит меж нами, заглядывая в глаза. На орбите судно сопровождают тысячи молчаливых спутников — это тела погибших, выброшенные в шлюзы.

languages.text: We made it to the Hermitage, an outcome made possible solely by the Emperor's mercy. The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the station, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.
languages.original_text: Мы достигли станции Скит, и лишь милость Императора позволила нам сделать это. Корабль изжеван челюстями голодного Имматериума, безумие поселилось на наших палубах и ходит меж нами, заглядывая в глаза. На орбите судно сопровождают тысячи молчаливых спутников — это тела погибших, выброшенные в шлюзы.

traits.locale_text: We made it to the planet Skit, an outcome made possible solely by the Emperor's mercy. The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the planet, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

The vessel is in orbit around the planet, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the planet, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

We made it to the Hermitage, an outcome made possible solely by the Emperor's mercy. The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the station, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

languages.text: Hemos llegado al Hermitage, algo que solo ha sido posible gracias a la misericordia del Emperador. El Inmaterio, voraz, ha masticado nuestra nave y la locura se ha apoderado de cubiertas enteras. Acecha entre nosotros, mirándonos a los ojos. La nave orbita la estación, rodeada por miles de satélites silenciosos: los cuerpos eyectados de los muertos.
languages.original_text: We made it to the Hermitage, an outcome made possible solely by the Emperor's mercy. The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the station, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

traits.locale_text: Hemos llegado al Hermitage, algo que solo ha sido posible gracias a la misericordia del Emperador. El Inmaterio, voraz, ha masticado nuestra nave y la locura se ha apoderado de cubiertas enteras. Acecha entre nosotros, mirándonos a los ojos. La nave orbita la estación, rodeada por miles de satélites silenciosos: los cuerpos eyectados de los muertos.

languages.text: 幸亏有了帝皇的庇佑，我们才勉强抵达了隐士庐。我们的舰船已经被贪婪的亚空间嚼成了渣滓。疯狂在我们的甲板上生根发芽，徘徊于我们之间，凝视着我们的双眼。舰船停靠在星站的轨道上，周围散落着数以千计的、无声的卫星——那些都是被丢出舰船的尸体。
languages.original_text: We made it to the Hermitage, an outcome made possible solely by the Emperor's mercy. The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the station, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

traits.locale_text: 幸亏有了帝皇的庇佑，我们才勉强抵达了隐士庐。我们的舰船已经被贪婪的亚空间嚼成了渣滓。疯狂在我们的甲板上生根发芽，徘徊于我们之间，凝视着我们的双眼。舰船停靠在星站的轨道上，周围散落着数以千计的、无声的卫星——那些都是被丢出舰船的尸体。

languages.text: 私達はエルミタージュに辿り着いた。これもひとえに皇帝の慈悲で実現したことだ。船は貪欲な非物質世界に噛み砕かれて、狂気が私達のデッキと私達の間に根を張り、こちらを見つめている。船はステーションの周回軌道にいて、何千もの声なき衛星―つまり遺棄された死者の遺体が、その周りに集まっている。
languages.original_text: We made it to the Hermitage, an outcome made possible solely by the Emperor's mercy. The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the station, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

traits.locale_text: 私達はエルミタージュに辿り着いた。これもひとえに皇帝の慈悲で実現したことだ。船は貪欲な非物質世界に噛み砕かれて、狂気が私達のデッキと私達の間に根を張り、こちらを見つめている。船はステーションの周回軌道にいて、何千もの声なき衛星―つまり遺棄された死者の遺体が、その周りに集まっている。

languages.text: Wir haben es zur Eremitage geschafft, was nur durch die Gnade des Imperators möglich wurde. Das Schiff wurde von dem gefräßigen Immaterium verschlungen, und der Wahnsinn hat auf unseren Decks Wurzeln geschlagen und schleicht sich unter uns, um uns in die Augen zu starren. Das Schiff befindet sich in einer Umlaufbahn um die Station, umringt von Tausenden stummer Satelliten — den abgeworfenen Körpern der Toten.
languages.original_text: We made it to the Hermitage, an outcome made possible solely by the Emperor's mercy. The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the station, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

languages.text: Nous sommes arrivés à l'Ermitage, un miracle qui n'a été rendu possible que par la miséricorde de l'Empereur. L'Immaterium insatiable a déchiqueté le vaisseau et la folie s'est répandue sur tous les ponts, avide de nos âmes. Le vaisseau est en orbite autour de la station, en compagnie de milliers de satellites silencieux... les corps éjectés des défunts.
languages.original_text: We made it to the Hermitage, an outcome made possible solely by the Emperor's mercy. The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the station, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

traits.locale_text: Nous sommes arrivés à l'Ermitage, un miracle qui n'a été rendu possible que par la miséricorde de l'Empereur. L'Immaterium insatiable a déchiqueté le vaisseau et la folie s'est répandue sur tous les ponts, avide de nos âmes. Le vaisseau est en orbite autour de la station, en compagnie de milliers de satellites silencieux... les corps éjectés des défunts.

languages.text: Yalnızca İmparator'un merhameti olarak tanımlayabileceğim bir şekilde İnzivagâh'a ulaştık. Gemi, doymak bilmez Tindiyar tarafından yutuldu ve delilik, güvertelerimize kök saldı; aramızda sinsice dolaşıp gözlerimizin içine bakıyor. Gemi, istasyonun yörüngesinde, binlerce sessiz uydunun, dışarı atılmış ölü bedenlerin arasına sıkışmış durumda.
languages.original_text: We made it to the Hermitage, an outcome made possible solely by the Emperor's mercy. The ship has been chewed up by the ravenous Immaterium, and madness has taken root across our decks and stalks among us, staring us in the eyes. The vessel is in orbit around the station, thronged by thousands of silent satellites — the jettisoned bodies of the dead.

traits.locale_text: Yalnızca İmparator'un merhameti olarak tanımlayabileceğim bir şekilde İnzivagâh'a ulaştık. Gemi, doymak bilmez Tindiyar tarafından yenildi. Delilik, güvertelerimize kök saldı; aramızda gizlice dolaşıyor, gözlerimizin içine bakıyor. Gemi, istasyonun yörüngesinde, binlerce sessiz uydunun, dışarı atılmış ölü bedenlerin arasına sıkışmış durumda.
